meanings.definition: Having blood glucose levels higher than normal but not high enough to be classified as diabetes.
meanings.sent1: She was told she was prediabetic after her check-up.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that being prediabetic meant taking extra care of her diet.
meanings.sent3: The prediabetic cupcake looked tempting, but she resisted the sugary treat.
meanings.sent4: His prediabetic condition was a warning sign to start making healthier choices.
meanings.sent5: The prediabetic label made her realize the importance of monitoring her sugar intake.

meanings.definition: A person who is at risk of developing diabetes.
meanings.sent1: He was identified as a prediabetic during his annual physical.
meanings.sent2: The support group welcomed new prediabetics with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The prediabetic joked that he was in the 'waiting room' for diabetes.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as a prediabetic on the brink of a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The prediabetic community shared tips on managing their health to prevent diabetes.
